description:
Tree Preservation Application At:
De Beauvoir Court, 58 Northchurch Road, Islington, London, N1 3NX

TPO Reference:
T1 & T2 â€“ 2 x Ash of LBI TPO (No. 251) 2003

PO Number:
T100306

Work Specifications:
2 x Ash (T1 & T2) as detailed in LBI TPO (No.251) TPO 2003
Crown reduce by a maximum of 25-30%( Application was for a reduction and not for thinning works and therefore no thinning other than removal of epicormic re-growth).
Cut back to clear the front elevation of the building by a maximum if 2m.
Remove Epicormic and deadwood
decision_conditions:
The Tree Preservation Team shall be notified at least 2 working days prior t the work being carried out to enable the Tree Officers to be present when works are carried out. (Photopgrahic records are retained of all site inspections and protected trees to assess work standards)

Reason: To monitor the standard and compliance of works in accordance with the council's tree policy
